name: Book Library
backend_requirements: 1. Book model: id, title (required), author (required), year (integer, optional), isbn (optional)
2. CRUD endpoints: GET /api/books, POST /api/books, PUT /api/books/:id, DELETE /api/books/:id
3. Search support: ?query=text searches title and author
4. Input validation: title and author required, year must be 4 digits
frontend_requirements: 1. Book list table with columns: title, author, year
2. Add book form with title, author, year, isbn fields
3. Edit button opens form with pre-filled data
5. Simple search box to filter books

api_endpoints.description: List all books (supports ?query=text to search title and author)
